product_name: Igloo Super Tough STX-54 Sportsman Cooler - 54 qt.
long_description: The 54 qt. Igloo Super Tough STX-54 Sportsman Cooler is built to meet your needs when car camping, fishing or heading to the work site. It'll keep your food cold for up to 5 days in 90F heat.
short_description: The 54 qt. Igloo Super Tough STX-54 Sportsman Cooler is built to meet your needs when car camping, fishing or heading to the work site. It'll keep your food cold for up to 5 days in 90F heat.
